description: Chai tea is a sweet and spicy hot drink made by steeping black tea with aromatic Indian spices like cinnamon, cardamom, and ginger. This chai tea latte takes these fragrant flavors to the next level by incorporating vanilla, almond milk, and dark rum to create the ideal holiday cocktail. Serve with cream and star anise, or go dairy-free.
